name: part_000
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY1】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony hololive STAGE2【チラ見せ】 [4C3kreEOk1Q]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Waiting screen for 'hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony' with event hashtags and visitor instructions.
A slideshow of fan messages and illustrations celebrating hololive 6th fes., set to background music.
Introduction of hololive-related products from Bandai and Bandai Spirits, and the special photo booth at the EXPO.
